医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
Steritas 的儿科糖皮质激素毒性指数应用于临床试验以评估类固醇毒性Steritas LLC. 是一家致力于加强类固醇治疗患者护理的公司，宣布 Alder Hey 儿童 NHS 基金会信托基金和利物浦临床试验中心将在一项临床试验中应用其 Steritas 儿科糖皮质激素毒性指数 (pGTI)，以比较疗效、静脉注射糖皮质激素（类固醇）与口服糖皮质激素（类固醇）治疗幼年特发性关节炎（JIA）儿童和青少年的安全性和成本效益。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240925/Steritas-Pediatric-Glucocorticoid-Toxicity-Index-applied-by-Alder-Hey-Childrens-NHS-Foundation-Trust-and-Liverpool-Clinical-Trials-评估儿童青少年特发性关节炎类固醇毒性的临床试验中心.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240925/Steritas-Pediatric-Glucocorticoid-Toxicity-Index-applied-by-Alder-Hey-Childrens-NHS-Foundation-Trust-and-Liverpool-Clinical-Trials-评估青少年特发性关节炎儿童类固醇毒性的临床试验中心.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3d9bc32c-a50c-4b50-acd3-c443197f7fa3 Wed, 25 Sep 2024 02:05:00 -0400 Steritas' Pediatric Glucocorticoid Toxicity Index applied in clinical trial to assess steroid-toxicity
三分之一的前职业美国橄榄球运动员表示自己曾喝醉过的现实 - CTE研究发现，三分之一的前美国橄榄球运动员报告称存在 CTE，这与较高的自杀风险和心理健康问题显着相关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240925/One-third-of-former-professional-American-football-players-report-a-punch-drunk-reality-CTE.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240925/One-third-of-former-professional-American-football-players-report-a-punch-drunk-reality-CTE.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=42c7f4ec-4309-48b8-98f8-c4c2379d201c Wed, 25 Sep 2024 00:59:00 -0400 One-third of former professional American football players report a punch-drunk reality - CTE
一种更快、更便宜的检测全血中免疫自身抗体的方法研究人员开发了一种快速且经济实惠的全血检测方法来检测 I 型干扰素的自身抗体，从而能够快速诊断免疫疾病。这种新方法通过解决当前测试的关键局限性而具有潜在的临床影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240925/A-faster-cheaper-method-to-detect-immune-autoantibodies-in-whole-blood.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240925/A-faster-cheaper-method-to-detect-immune-autoantibodies-in-whole-blood.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6cc17ff1-8258-43a3-9e01-c3c23aff8b72 Wed, 25 Sep 2024 00:14:00 -0400 A faster, cheaper method to detect immune autoantibodies in whole blood
COVID-19 大流行减少了美国的性伴侣和活动COVID-19 大流行显着减少了美国性伴侣和性接触的数量，其中未婚女性的下降最为明显。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240924/COVID-19-pandemic-reduced- Sex-partners-and-activity-in-the-US.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240924/COVID-19-pandemic-reduced- Sex-partners-and-activity-in-the-US.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ccfdd38b-6584-46d8-81ce-7b6cf3c21bee Tue, 24 Sep 2024 23:48:00 -0400 COVID-19 pandemic reduced sexual partners and activity in the U.S.
通过猫的眼睛——猫科动物眼睛的仿生可能会彻底改变机器人视觉研究人员开发了一种受猫科动物眼睛启发的视觉系统，该系统使用垂直拉长的瞳孔和绒毡层拟态来在各种照明条件下实现卓越的伪装破坏和物体识别。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240924/Through-the-eyes-of-a-cat-e28093-biomimicry-of-feline-eyes-may-revolutionize-robotic-vision.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240924/Through-the-eyes-of-a-cat-e28093-biomimicry-of-feline-eyes-may-revolutionize-robotic-vision.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a806e570-90cd-4fe4-b87c-522d3ac062cc Tue, 24 Sep 2024 23:32:00 -0400 Through the eyes of a cat – biomimicry of feline eyes may revolutionize robotic vision
尽管取得了进展，但女性在心血管疾病治疗方面的服务仍然不足《心脏》杂志在线发表的一份共识声明总结道，尽管在心脏病和中风的医疗管理方面取得了重大进展，但英国和其他地方的女性仍然错过了第一号杀手——心血管疾病的重要治疗。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240924/Women-remain-underserved-in-cardioangio-disease-treatment-despite-advances.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240924/Women-remain-underserved-in-cardioangio-disease-treatment-despite-advances.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ca7515d1-9efe-40a8-9922-00150f5bf4b4 Tue, 24 Sep 2024 23:17:12 -0400 Women remain underserved in cardiovascular disease treatment despite advances
研究揭示亚洲疫情检测资源的缺口杜克大学-新加坡国立大学医学院领导的一项具有里程碑意义的研究显示，尽管最近发生了大流行，但南亚和东南亚的疫情检测工作仍然资源不足，只有约一半的国家将病原体基因组监测举措纳入其国家计划。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240924/Study-reveals-gaps-in-outbreak-detection-resources-in-Asia.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240924/Study-reveals-gaps-in-outbreak-detection-resources-in-Asia.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=87edbdae-b48a-45b3-9f8f-d9f00b3b7d49 Tue, 24 Sep 2024 23:13:00 -0400 Study reveals gaps in outbreak detection resources in Asia
审查凸显全球禽流感传播控制策略的失败由皮尔布赖特研究所领导的对不同物种中哺乳动物间禽流感持续传播的审查表明，全球控制策略并未发挥作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240924/Review-highlights-failures-in-global-control-strategies-for-bird-flu-transmission.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240924/Review-highlights-failures-in-global-control-strategies-for-bird-flu-transmission.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9cc8f848-a97a-4f9e-8146-d81fd21bfc8d Tue, 24 Sep 2024 23:10:00 -0400 Review highlights failures in global control strategies for bird flu transmission
研究揭示迷幻剂引起的焦虑减轻机制一项新的研究表明，一种类似于LSD、裸盖菇素和麦司卡林的经典迷幻药可以激活大脑中的一种细胞类型，从而使其他邻近的神经元保持沉默，这一结果为了解此类药物如何减轻焦虑提供了见解。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240924/Research-uncovers-mechanism-of-psychedelic-induced-anxiety-reduction.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240924/Research-uncovers-mechanism-of-psychedelic-induced-anxiety-reduction.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a3da9b33-84e2-453d-a9b9-6865dd4898cd Tue, 24 Sep 2024 23:08:00 -0400 Research uncovers mechanism of psychedelic-induced anxiety reduction
新研究挑战多巴胺在安慰剂效应和缓解疼痛中的作用根据 Ulrike Bingel 于 9 月 24 日在开放获取期刊 PLOS Biology 上发表的一项研究，新发现反对多巴胺在健康志愿者中建立积极治疗期望和安慰剂镇痛的治疗效果体验过程中的直接因果作用。德国埃森大学医院和同事。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240924/New-study-challenges-dopamines-role-in-placebo-effects-and-pain-relief.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240924/New-study-challenges-dopamines-role-in-placebo-effects-and-pain-relief.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f730b3f4-6b9f-458b-91f3-7ed843507ea1 Tue, 24 Sep 2024 23:00:32 -0400 New study challenges dopamine's role in placebo effects and pain relief
